channel.title: CTFs and Competitions on Liberty University Cyber Defense Club
channel.description: Recent content in CTFs and Competitions on Liberty University Cyber Defense Club

item.title: CTFs
item.description: What is a CTF? CTF (Capture The Flag) competitions are a great way to learn more about cybersecurity and also just to have fun competing with a group of friends. CTFs typically last for two to three days and have several different types of challenges that the player can try to complete for points. This portion of the guide provides a resource for learning more about what CTFs are and how to get started competing.
